extendedInfo.description: Bad Gremlin stole Christmas Presents! You better Help Santa to retrieve them, otherwise Christmas will turn into a total flop! Leave My Presents is an arcade game, which will test Your reflex. Hit Gremlin with snowballs to collect points, and retrieve Your Christmas presents. Help Santa to save Christmas!We will be thankful for any feedback about our game, it's efficiency and compatibility. With Your help, we will be able to create better games. Fly With Monkey team.
